title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, May 19, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes the battle of Chancellorsville, including details of how General Jackson got shot. He describes the actions of the Yankees in the Valley, and the reactions of the inhabitants.
keywords: Military Authority, Death/Casualties, Church/Religious Activity, Battle Description, Troop Movement, Prisons/Prisoners, Women, Home Front, Patriotism, American Civil War
